name: dowdily
content:

in a way that is not attractive or fashionable: dowdily dressed She was dowdily dressed in a baggy tweed skirt. The hotel was dowdily decorated, but relaxed and comfortable. Related word
dowdy
More examplesFewer examplesOne of the other guests at the table was a dowdily dressed middle-aged man.I don't want to offend you, but why do you dress so dowdily?She was dowdily dressed in black with an ugly grey hat on her head.They were all bespectacled and dowdily clad in muted colours.I can't see any reason for him to dress so dowdily.
